about.content:
I work on Reinforcement Learning and robotics at OpenAI.
I used to work on gradient-based metalearning and learning algorithms at DeepMind.
Before that I did a PhD in cryptocurrencies at the University of Warsaw.
I spent a lot of time participating in various programming competitions, in particular, I won 3 golds medals at International Olympiad in Informatics.
